title: The office of the Divisional Joint Director of Town Planning shall send its remarks to Collector (1) or the Authority, as the case may be, within two months from the receipt of proposal from the Collector (1) or the Authority, as the case may be, or receipt of reply from the Project Proponent/s in respect of any requisition made by him, whichever is later
clause_text: The office of the Divisional Joint Director of Town Planning shall send its remarks to Collector (1) or the Authority, as the case may be, within two months from the receipt of proposal from the Collector (1) or the Authority, as the case may be, or receipt of reply from the Project Proponent/s in respect of any requisition made by him, whichever is later. Such master layout approval will be given with the condition that project proponent will not commence work without environmental clearance. Such environmental clearance shall be submitted at the time of sanction to the building permission. Sanctioned master Plan layout along with complete set of drawings shall be endorsed to the concerned branch office of Town Planning Department, (1) as required for the further permissions.
section: Master Layout Plan Approval by the Collector (1) or by the Planning Authority, as the case may be :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
